message.content: This question requires knowledge about how birds navigate and find their way. Some birds have the ability to detect and use Earth's magnetic field for navigation. Option (A) is correct because birds can also use landmarks to navigate, but it is not the only method they use. Option (B) is incorrect because birds do not use road signs for navigation. Option (C) is unrelated to the navigation abilities of birds.
